# streamkap_tag (Data Source)

Retrieves information about a **Streamkap tag** by ID.

Use this data source to look up tag details for use in other resources.

[Documentation](https://docs.streamkap.com/streamkap-provider-for-terraform)

## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    streamkap = {
      source  = "streamkap-com/streamkap"
      version = ">= 2.0.0"
    }
  }
  required_version = ">= 1.0.0"
}

provider "streamkap" {}

data "streamkap_tag" "example-tag" {
  # id = "670e5ca40afe1d3983ce0c22" # Development tag
  id = "670e5bab0d119c0d1f8cda9d" # Production tag
}

output "example-tag" {
  value = data.streamkap_tag.example-tag
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the tag to retrieve. Example: `670e5ca40afe1d3983ce0c22` for Development, `670e5bab0d119c0d1f8cda9d` for Production.

### Read-Only

- `custom` (Boolean) Whether this is a custom user-defined tag (`true`) or system-provided (`false`).
- `description` (String) Human-readable description of the tag's purpose.
- `name` (String) Display name of the tag. Example: `Development` or `Production`.
- `system` (Boolean) Whether this is a built-in system tag (`true`) or user-created (`false`).
- `type` (List of String) List of entity types this tag can be applied to (e.g., `source`, `destination`, `pipeline`).
